problem_text_cn: 如图,直线a∥b∥c,且a,b之间的距离为1,△ABC和△CDE是两块全等的直角三角形纸板,其中∠ABC=∠CDE=90°,∠BAC=∠DCE=30°,它们的顶点都在平行线上,则b,c之间的距离是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, and the distance between a and b is N_0, △ABC and △CDE are two congruent right triangular cardboards, where ∠ABC = ∠CDE = N_1, ∠BAC = ∠DCE = N_2, their vertices are on parallel lines, then the distance between b and c is ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:∵a,b之间的距离为1,∠BAC=∠DCE=30°,∴AB=\frac{1}{tan30°}=√{3},∵△ABC和△CDE是两块全等的直角三角形纸板,∴CD=AB=√{3},
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了锐角三角函数关系以及全等三角形的性质,得出AB的长是解题关键．
